home.testimonials.david.name: David Cohen
home.testimonials.david.text: I received the Tefillin quickly and in excellent quality. It helped me connect to tradition even on base and feel closer to home.
home.testimonials.moshe.name: Moshe Levi
home.testimonials.moshe.text: Amazing service! The Tefillin arrived at the base and the service was professional and caring. I recommend it to every soldier!
home.testimonials.avi.name: Avi Israel

home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
home.faq.free.question: Is the service really free?
home.faq.free.answer: Yes, the service is completely free for every soldier. We believe every soldier deserves to connect to Jewish tradition without financial barriers.
home.faq.delivery.question: How long does it take to receive the Tefillin?
home.faq.delivery.answer: Usually 3-7 business days, depending on the base location. We do everything to deliver as quickly as possible.
home.faq.kosher.question: Are the Tefillin kosher?
home.faq.kosher.answer: Yes, all our Tefillin are kosher mehadrin and approved by the IDF Rabbinate and certified rabbis.
home.faq.afterService.question: What happens after discharge?
home.faq.afterService.answer: The Tefillin remain yours! It's our gift to you for your military service and connection to tradition.
